verses.verse: A <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> But a <S%H8003>just<s%> <S%H68>weight<s%> is His <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
When <S%H2087>pride<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> then <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H7036>dishonor,<s%> But with the <S%H9492>humble<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
The <S%H8538>integrity<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H5148>guide<s%> them, But the <S%H5558>falseness<s%> of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> will <S%H7703>destroy<s%> them.
<S%H1952>Riches<s%> do not <S%H3276>profit<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> But <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> will <S%H3474>smooth<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his own <S%H7564>wickedness.<s%>
The <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them, But the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> will be <S%H3920>caught<s%> by [their own] <S%H1942>greed.<s%>
When a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4194>dies,<s%> [his] <S%H8615>expectation<s%> will perish, And the <S%H6>hope<s%> of <S%H8431>strong<s%> <S%H202>men<s%> perishes.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H2502>delivered<s%> from <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H935>takes<s%> his <S%H8478>place.<s%>

With [his] <S%H6310>mouth<s%> the <S%H2611>godless<s%> <S%H2611>man<s%> <S%H7843>destroys<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> But through <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H2502>delivered.<s%>
When it goes <S%H2898>well<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> the <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H5970>rejoices,<s%> And when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> perish, there is <S%H6>glad<s%> <S%H7440>shouting.<s%>

By the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> a <S%H7176>city<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> But by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> it is <S%H2040>torn<s%> <S%H2040>down.<s%>
He who <S%H936>despises<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>sense,<s%> But a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H2790>keeps<s%> <S%H2790>silent.<s%>
He who <S%H1980>goes<s%> about as a <S%H7400>talebearer<s%> <S%H1540>reveals<s%> <S%H5475>secrets,<s%> But he who is <S%H539>trustworthy<s%> <S%H7307><s%> <S%H3680>conceals<s%> a <S%H1697>matter.<s%>
Where <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8458>guidance,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>fall,<s%> But in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> there is <S%H8668>victory.<s%>

He who is <S%H6148>surety<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> will <S%H9563>surely<s%> <S%H7489>suffer<s%> for it, But he who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H8628>going<s%> <S%H8628>surety<s%> is <S%H982>safe.<s%>
A <S%H2580>gracious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8551>attains<s%> <S%H9202>honor,<s%> And <S%H6184>violent<s%> <S%H6184>men<s%> <S%H8551>attain<s%> <S%H6239>riches.<s%>
The <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1580>does<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> <S%H2617>good,<s%> But the <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H394>man<s%> <S%H5916>does<s%> <S%H7607>himself<s%> <S%H5916>harm.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6213>earns<s%> <S%H8267>deceptive<s%> <S%H7938>wages,<s%> But he who <S%H2232>sows<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> [gets] a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H7938>reward.<s%>

He <S%H9210>who<s%> is <S%H9210>steadfast<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> [will attain] to <S%H9132>life,<s%> And he who <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> [will bring about] his own <S%H4194>death.<s%>
The <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> But the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> in [their] <S%H1870>walk<s%> are His <S%H7522>delight.<s%>

<S%H3027>Assuredly,<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>man<s%> will not <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> But the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H4422>delivered.<s%>
[As] a <S%H5141>ring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in a swine's <S%H639>snout,<s%> [So is] a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> who <S%H5493>lacks<s%> <S%H2940>discretion.<s%>
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> [But] the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>

<S%H3426>There<s%> is one who <S%H6340>scatters,<s%> yet <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H5750>all<s%> the <S%H5750>more,<s%> And there is one who <S%H2820>withholds<s%> <S%H3476>what<s%> is <S%H3476>justly<s%> <S%H3476>due,<s%> but [it results] <S%H389>only<s%> in <S%H4270>want.<s%>
The <S%H1293>generous<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> will be <S%H1878>prosperous,<s%> And he who <S%H7301>waters<s%> will <S%H1931>himself<s%> be <S%H9196>watered.<s%>
He who <S%H4513>withholds<s%> <S%H1250>grain,<s%> the <S%H3816>people<s%> will <S%H6895>curse<s%> him, But <S%H1293>blessing<s%> will be on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him who <S%H7666>sells<s%> [it.]
He who <S%H7836>diligently<s%> <S%H7836>seeks<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H7522>favor,<s%> But he who <S%H1875>searches<s%> after <S%H9567>evil,<s%> it will <S%H935>come<s%> to him.
He who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in his <S%H6239>riches<s%> will <S%H5307>fall,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like the [green] <S%H5929>leaf.<s%>
He who <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%> will <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And the <S%H191>foolish<s%> will be <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H2450>wisehearted.<s%>
The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> And he who is <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3947>wins<s%> <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

<S%H2005>If<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H9608>rewarded<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H2398>sinner!<s%>
